links.*: EA's The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[7 January|7]]''' - [[Jarion Monroe]], who would voice the [[King of the Dead]] in ''[[EA's The Return of the King]]'', is born.
* '''[[18 January|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin (18 January 1948)|a letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin]].
* '''[[18 January|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Rosemary (18 January 1948)|to Rosemary]]
* '''[[25 January|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 113]].
==February==
* '''[[2 January|2]]''' - [[Nils-Lennart Johannesson]] is born.
==March==
* '''[[1 March|1]]''' - Actor [[Steven M. Kramer]] is born.
==April==
* '''[[7 April|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 114]].
==June==
* '''[[15 June|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 115]].
==August==
* '''[[5 August|5]]''' -  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 116]].
* '''[[20 August|20]]''' - [[John Noble]], who would play [[Denethor]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], is born.

==September==
* '''[[8 September|8]]''' - Artist [[Michael Hague]] is born.
*'''[[14 September|14]]''' - Around that date Tolkien completes the drafts of the final parts of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' at the home of his son, [[Michael Tolkien|Michael]].
*'''?''' - Tolkien visits [[Cambridge]] to view the ''Ancrene Wisse'' manuscript.

==October==
* '''[[14 October|14]]''' - Narrator [[Gerard Murphy]] is born.
* '''[[31 October|31]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 117]].
* '''?''' - [[Katharine Farrer]] sends a letter to Tolkien expressing her opinions about the ''[[Ainulindalë (Morgoth's Ring)|Ainulindalë]]''.

==November==
* '''[[24 November|24]]''' - Artist [[John Alvin]] is born. 
==?==
* '''?''' - [[Dick Plotz]] is born.
* '''?''' - ''[[Studia Neophilologica Vol. 20, Nos. 1-2]]'', containing an essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Simonne d'Ardenne|S.R.T.O. d'Ardenne]], is published.
